text.more:
Created by Christopher Roberts with data published by Dimensions.ai that contains all 2020 articles and preprints from the Dimensions.ai database related to COVID-19. 

Data extracted in Google BigQuery, analyzed with the metaknowledge package in Python, visualized with Gephi, and deployed with SigmaJS on GitHub Pages.
text.intro:
For the 200 most-cited COVID-19 publications in 2020, this network graph represents co-authorship linkages.  Nodes are colored by step distance form an arbitrarily selected terminal node.

Try searching by author name below for the Director of NIH, Robert Redfield.
text.title: Co-author Network Visualization for the Top 200 Most Cited COVID-19 Publications of 2020
